org.springframework.statemachine.annotation

Annotation Type OnTransitionStart


  • @Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Inherited
 @Documented
public @interface OnTransitionStart
    Indicates that a method is candidate to be called with a Transition.

    A method annotated with @OnTransitionStart may accept a parameter of type ExtendedState, Map if map argument itself is annotated with EventHeaders, StateMachine, Message or Exception.

    Return value can be anything and is effectively discarded.

    Author:
    Janne Valkealahti

      Optional Elements

      java.lang.String[] target
      The target states.
